entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to snow or ice pellets after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
